column4: Just for some background on the ledah setuo they were here yesterday with this problem, the kubuntu is a fresh install, personally I suspect something is amiss with the windows end of the boot
as I get it the pc-box is a dualboot from windoze and ubu, but a live medium on that box would save much of my crystall balls battery ;)
Heh I think we need a bootscript is all.
